text: Many people argue that the government requires to invest more  money in order to develop the railway system of the country. This is because this mode of transportation  is comparatively more environmentally friendly than other modes. Especially, overnight trains and high- speed railways can be matched with aeroplanes. However, to attract more and more travellers, the authorities  should take certain steps and strategies to ensure reliability, convenience and punctuality. This is highly beneficial to reduce on road traffic congestions and pollutions  significantly.

In many rural areas, where the public transportation services function poorly therefore, the local community largely depends on private vehicle than the public one. Similarly, even today, in the most developed countries  are still facing the problem of lack of punctuality and unreliability; therefore, it is unnecessary  to develop railway systems of the country.
